findyourway.title: Bromma
findyourway.description: Bromma Stockholm Airport is Stockholm's city-airport and is the quickest way to and from Stockholm.

findyourway.title: Arlanda
findyourway.description: Arlanda is Sweden's biggest airport and acts like a central hub for the region of Stockholm and Scandinavia.

findyourway.title: Hötorgets T-bana
findyourway.description: Exit Olof Palmes gata, turn right on to Olof Palmes gata and take the stairs up to Malmskillnadsgatan. Continue straight along David Bagares gata. Take the first right onto Regeringsgatan, Nalen is on the left side.

findyourway.title: Östermalmstorgs T-bana
findyourway.description: Exit towards Birger Jarlsgatan, turn right and follow Birger Jarlsgatan past Stureplan to Engelbrektsplan. Turn left onto David Bagares gata, up the stairs to Regeringsgatan. Turn left around the corner and you are at Nalen.

findyourway.title: Elite Hotel Stockholm Plaza
findyourway.description: Historical Elite Hotel Stockholm Plaza is located in central Stockholm near the beautiful Humlegården park and lively Stureplan. Elite Hotel Stockholm Plaza is only a 220m short walk from the venue Nalen.
